 Define for un-tagged vlan Id.
 
EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_CTRL sub-commands

The following macros are sub-commands that to be used when issueing emac_ioctl with EMAC_IOCTL_CMD set to EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_CTRL

#define EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_SET_DEFAULT_TBL   ((uint32_t)1U)
 
#define EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_SET_ENTRY   ((uint32_t)2U)
 
#define EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_SET_DEFAULT_VLAN_ID   ((uint32_t)3U)
 
#define EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_GET_ENTRY   ((uint32_t)4U)

Detailed Description

EMAC driver IOCTL API inteface specification.

Note
IOCTL API is only supported for am65xx SOC

This API header file should be included in an application as follows:

#include <ti/drv/emac/emac_ioctl.h>

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_AGEING_INTERVAL_S EMAC_IOCTL_FDB_AGEING_INTERVAL

FDB Ageing interval.

Value is in nanoseconds

typedef struct EMAC_IOCTL_PORT_PRIO_MAP_S EMAC_IOCTL_PORT_PRIO_MAP

Port Priority configuration structure.

This arrary is used to map differnt PCP values (0-7) to 1 of 8 host/port queues.

typedef struct EMAC_IOCTL_PREEMPTION_ENTRY_S EMAC_IOCTL_PREEMPTION_ENTRY

proirity for frame premption configuration structure

it will be input param for premtion ioctl.

typedef struct EMAC_IOCTL_PREMPT_OR_CUT_THROUGH_MAP_S EMAC_IOCTL_PREMPT_OR_CUT_THROUGH_MAP

pcp to prempt or cut through configuration structure

These arrary is used to map differnt PCP values (0-7) to premption or cut through.

typedef struct EMAC_IOCTL_PRIO_REGEN_MAP_S EMAC_IOCTL_PRIO_REGEN_MAP

Priority regen configuration structure.

This 8 byte array is used to configure the priority regeneration table for boundary ports.

typedef struct EMAC_IOCTL_SPECIAL_FRAME_DEFAULT_PRIO_S EMAC_IOCTL_SPECIAL_FRAME_DEFAULT_PRIO

proirity for special frames configuration structure

priority values possible(0-7)

typedef struct EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_DEFAULT_ENTRY_S EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_DEFAULT_ENTRY

Default VLAN entry definition for EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_SET_DEFAULT_VLAN_ID sub-command.

Used to configure default vlan entry for EMAC_SWITCH_PORT0 and EMAC_SWITCH_PORT1 and EMAC_SWITCH_PORT0
